coded_answer.p: I have recently had a week's holiday in London and, during my stay, I went to see the musical show 'Over the rainbow', which was shown at your theatre.
At firstFirst, the advertisement said that there were discounts availablesavailable, but when I went to buy the tickets there were not any discounts.

As if this was not enough, the show, instead of starting at half past seven as the advertisement said, started at a quarter past eight and one of the main actors, who was supposed to be Danny Brook, was someone else.
On top of everytingeverything, the restaurant which was announcedadvertised in the advertisement was closed because it was being arranged.
You can imagine how dissappointeddisappointed I felt after that evening, and I am writing to ask you for a further returnrefund of part of the money.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
